page.title: 11Spitals Cross Housing Est. 1
page.content: Most inhabitants of the Spitals Cross Estate situated near the North end of Edenbridge, Kent are either unemployed or on a low wage. Perhaps due to this fact many of them rent their homes. Many have lived in their terraced homes for more than five years and, in one case, 15 years. Most people or their families originate from London and the surrounding areas. The two main reasons moving were bigger houses and to be nearer to relatives. Although there are many factories in the estate very few actually work in them. Others either drive or walk to a local job in the surrounding areas. Some travel by train to London. There are not many garages and parking facilities on the estate but there are many cars. Not all of which are privately owned as some are company cars distributed by local firms.
